quest.name: A Trial Before the Trial
journal: Hien is ready to become a warrior of the Steppe.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: <yawn> That was just what I needed!

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: A new beginning lies beyond the horizon. We have but to seize it with our own two hands.

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: Was the food to your liking? Good, good...

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Now then, Cirina, if you would tell us of the trial we must undertake that we might participate in the Naadam.

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: Ah, yes! As I mentioned before, to be recognized as warriors of the Steppe, one must follow in the footsteps of the legendary warrior Bardam.

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: He embarked on a great pilgrimage, eschewing cart and horse, and walked for many malms until he came to a holy place, thereafter named Bardam's Mettle. There, at the altar, as he did, you must pray.

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: The altar lies deep within the breeding grounds of the yol. To complete your trial, you must tame one. Only then will your trial be complete.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Fair enough. And where is the entrance to Bardam's Mettle?

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: You must journey far, far to the west─beyond Chakha Zoh, where lie the bones of a great and wise woman.

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: Beyond the ruins of Ceol Aen, hidden within the mountains is a narrow pass. Follow it, and you will come to Bardam's Mettle.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Sounds to me like it'll be a trial just getting to the trial...

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: More than you may know. On the eve of the Naadam, many strive to improve their fortunes─some by abducting and enslaving the warriors of other tribes.

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: Be ever mindful of your surroundings, lest you be taken as well.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Hah! What grim expressions you wear while nodding so powerfully! Warriors such as you are not like to fall en route to a mere rite of passage.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: We shall proceed with all due caution, yes, but let us not worry overmuch.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: We will overcome this trial, and the next, and the next, until we stand triumphant. That is all there is to it, no?

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: With me, my friends! To the west! To Bardam's Mettle!

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: W-Wait, Hien! Oh dear. I knew I would forget.

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: Here─take these whistles. Once tamed, your yol will hearken to their call.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Thanks. We'll try them out once we've finished the trial.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Let's catch up to Hien and Gosetsu!

dialogue.name: CIRINA
dialogue.text: It is indeed a perilous journey, but I know you will succeed─as I once did.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: We still have a long way to go, but I think I can see that monument Cirina talked about.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I don't see Hien or Gosetsu, though. We should hurry!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Hey...I don't know about you, but I can't shake the feeling someone's watching us.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Cirina did warn us about tribes that kidnap warriors and make them fight for them. Something tells me we're about to meet them...

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: The foreigners!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: Your blood shall water the soil.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: They're wearing yellow. I've seen their clothes somewhere before...

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Is that the best you can do!? Come, villains! Come at me!

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are. As you can see, they left us little choice.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: I gather you were forced to dispatch a few yourself? So it goes. A few less warriors to face in the Naadam, eh?

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Ceol Aen is not much further. That said, I should be surprised if our would-be masters do not try to subdue us one final time...

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: They are here!? To arms!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: <huff> <puff> This is it! The real trial!

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Tread softly. We are for hallowed ground, and the kami are restless...

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Right. This must be the pass that leads to Bardam's Mettle.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: They say no foreigners have overcome this trial, but, well, there is a first time for everything, no?

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Perhaps you do not hail from these lands, but your forefathers did. You do them honor to carry on their legacy this day.

obj.n: In the Footsteps of Bardam the Brave
